description.paragraph: checked our racing club brings together the brightest engineering minds to design and build competitive racing vehicles. Through teamwork, innovation, and dedication, we've established ourselves as a formidable presence in collegiate racing competitions.

Our members gain hands-on experience in mechanical engineering, electrical systems, aerodynamics, project management, and team leadership â€“ skills that prepare them for successful careers in the automotive and engineering industries.

mission.title: Our Mission checked
mission.statement: To provide students with hands-on engineering experience through the design, construction, and racing of formula-style vehicles while promoting innovation, teamwork, and excellence in automotive engineering.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible in student racing.

values.title: Teamwork
values.description: Success comes through collaboration across engineering disciplines.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our work, from design to race day.
